whatToExpect: After submitting a service request, you'll receive quotes from multiple vetted professionals listed on Homezy. You can compare profiles, read reviews, and select the expert who best fits your needs and timeline.

faqs.question: Do construction engineers handle permits?
faqs.answer: Most construction engineers can assist with obtaining necessary permits and ensuring that projects comply with regulations.
